item.title: Managing Resources, how to make your SharePoint solutions “globally deployed”
item.author: vbiret+blog@outlook.com (Vincent Biret)
item.description: Introduction I wanted to publish this article months ago, back to the time I found this solution. But I did not mostly because of a lack of free time. Sebastien LEVERT, a top SharePoint developer and a member of Montreal’s SharePoint community, recently published a post about the same subject. Read it (sorry it’s in French), I’ll write my post so it is complementary. https://www.pimpmysharepoint.com/2014/01/09/deployer-des-fichiers-de-ressources-simplement/ Reminders To quickly summarize, when you develop SharePoint solutions and you want to support multiple languages (localize it) you need to use .
